metadata.title: CVE-2023-6604 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in FFmpeg. This vulnerability allows unexpected additionalCPU load and storage consumption, potentially leading to degradedperformance or denial of service via the demuxing of arbitrary data asXBIN-formatted data without proper format validation.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
